snippet: A friend of former New England Patriots star tight end Aaron Hernandez pleaded guilty on Monday to accessory after the fact for helping the NFL player after he shot a man to death in 2013....
lead_paragraph: A friend of former New England Patriots star tight end Aaron Hernandez pleaded guilty on Monday to accessory after the fact for helping the NFL player after he shot a man to death in 2013.

headline.main: Aaron Hernandez Pal Pleads Guilty to Accessory in Murder
headline.print_headline: Aaron Hernandez Pal Pleads Guilty to Accessory in Murder
